LJava
Class Utils

java.lang.Object
  LJava.Utils

public final class Utils
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Tzali Maimon This class offers a pre-define Formulas for some basic logical commands. This is used since LJ is still under the "rules" of the Java compiler and needs to represents its conditions as Objects.
